title: Add Fit Driver input preview + field mapping step during setup

sections.text: In the setup flow, add a preview step that shows the top candidate fields/events behind each selected Fit Driver along with sample values and fill-rate/coverage. Let users map or swap the underlying source field (e.g., choose a different CRM property, pick the correct event name, or select an alternate survey question) before continuing. Persist these mappings per workspace so subsequent ingests use the same field bindings without repeated user effort.
